abstract: United Nations General Assembly’s human rights committee approves resolutions denouncing dismal human rights conditions in several countries; recommends North Korea be referred to International Criminal Court.
lead_paragraph: In a statement, North Korea criticized the resolution and claimed that the United States “and other hostile forces” were behind it.

headline.main: Human Rights Committee Condemns North Korea
headline.print_headline: United Nations; Human Rights Committee Condemns North Korea

snippet: In a statement, North Korea criticized the resolution and claimed that the United States “and other hostile forces” were behind it.
